attributes.title: Just as slow as our Pres
attributes.review: Worst app on here. Why would Apple associate w something so slow, opinionated as our president. This app is worthless & unsuitable for anyone’s. Don’t use it. They give false info sometimes.

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This App Gave My Grandmother A Seizure, And Made My House ROLL. We Live On A Hill And Now Are Homeless Because Of This App. The Design Is So Horrible It Catches Your Phone On Fire Once You Open It. White People That Support ALM Come Up On Your Screen And Then KABOOM It Blows Up! A Horrible App Wouldn’t Recommend

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: I have never been so disappointed in an app, it keeps making my phone shut off 🤬I would like to speak to the manager, or whoever runs this thing

attributes.title: this app personally murdered my dog
attributes.review: wow, never before has my in diminished at such levels at it did when i downloaded this app. i was at risk of a mental breakdown and this about did it. Mental health workers in my area are concerned. Another citizen helped by pres. cheeto

attributes.title: just. no.
attributes.review: when i first opened the app i saw his 🍆.. maybe it was a cheeto and i’m overreacting, but it didn’t look like it. i would give this app a 0/5 if i could. there are so many bad reviews for a reason! we all saw the cheeto. he is a bad influence, my cousin was playing on my phone and when i asked for it back she saw the “cheeto” i am very disappointed with trump. she’s a 4 year old, this could scar her for life.

attributes.title: Literally why?
attributes.review: What is even the point of this app? Like- what do we need it for? When did we ever need an app for a president who literally doesn’t matter? Personal opinion check, he doesn’t need it ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: App didn’t even work good. It was trash, and I saw a picture of a orange pig? I don’t know why it was there, but it was. I do not recommend at all. Just horrible glitches and It’s just horrible. Also Vote for Biden.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is literally horrible it has so many bugs and this weird Orange chode guy as the mascot idk what that’s about but it’s not a family friendly app unless you don’t care about basic human rights 🤡😍💖🍒😻🥵🐠🦋😢😹

attributes.title: just no ❤️
attributes.review: this app was soo terrible. i opened it & this cheeto popped up. it made me throw up. & i had to go to the hospital & they told me not never open this app again because it’s cursed. this was the most horrible experience of my life. i am never downloading it again. please ban this app because now i am traumatized. i had to go into surgery because my stomach was so messed up from throwing up. hopefully i recover fast 😄

attributes.title: !TRAUMATIZING!
attributes.review: When I sighed up it asked for my phone number, so I put my phone number in and went on my marry way. Not even 10 minutes later my phone was exploding with threats from this app. I’m traumatized.
